blaster.name: blaster
blaster.description: One and done with humans, might take a few rounds with a robot

harpoon.name: harpoon
harpoon.description: The T2 Harpoon can pierce through even the highest grade of metal

neuralyzer.name: neuralyzer
neuralyzer.description: This is a neuralyzer, you can use this to fight the rouge robots

tablet.name: tablet
tablet.description: Syncs you to main board in the Control Lab. Get camera feed, seal off sector doors, and link cable to AI for configurations

memory.name: memory
memory.description: A 5 Petabyte memory chip used for storing the vast neural networks of quantum-machine learned consciousnesses

interface.name: interface
interface.description: A USB-G Interface with SDI cable. Used for large capacity high speed data transfer

motherboard.name: motherboard
motherboard.description:
A M2 Pro Apple Silicon motherboard.
Advanced material BUS capable of fiberoptic data transfer allows for relatively quick download of massive amount if information

sphere.name: sphere
sphere.description:
The Artificial Intelligence Transfer Sphere.
"Handling an A.I. is a sensitive task, it simply cannot be done with something as crude as a solid state device.
Just as a small push is all it takes at times to achieve madness, corrupting an A.I.'s personality matrix could achieve a much more DRASTIC effect.."
  - Dr. Z
